entry.title: WIND WARNING , Greenwood
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:42 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain and Fog, 6.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Greenwood 3:00 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Rain and Fog
Temperature: 6.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 90 %
Dewpoint: 4.4°C
Wind: E 42 km/h gust 59 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Rain at times heavy. Temperature rising to 12 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending overnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of thundershowers this evening and after midnight. Fog patches dissipating after midnight. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 90 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Temperature rising to 12 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers changing to 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022
